title: Ahead of Union Budget, MoS Finance Karad said, it will favour all sections of society - Economic Times
content:
1. Ahead of Union Budget, MoS Finance Karad said, it will favour all sections of society  Economic Times
  2. Budget 2022 LIVE: Digital rupee, 5G, crypto tax among major announcements  Hindustan Times
  3. Budget 2022 India Live Updates: FM Nirmala Sitharaman Speech Today Live from Parliament, Income Tax Slabs Rate for 2022-23 Live News, Railway Budget 2022 Live, Sensex, Nifty, Share Market Reactions Live, Union Budget Highlights,  The Indian Express
  4. Budget 2022 LIVE Updates: FM Sitharaman concludes her shortest budget speech, no change in income-tax...  Moneycontrol.com
  5. Union Budget 2022 Live Streaming: Budget 2022 Live Telecast, Income Tax Slab Rate Change 2022-23, FM Nirmala Sitharaman Budget 2022 Speech Live Updates, Budget Highlights Live, Railway Budget Live, Share Market, Nifty, Sensex Reactions Live  The Financial Express
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Union MoS Finance Bhagwat Karad added, "PM Modi expects that every group - be it the ruling side of the Opposition - should sit together and listen to the presenting of the Budget and cooperate." Sitharaman is scheduled to arrive in the Parliament at 10 AM, and at 11 AM, she will present the Union Budget. The Budget presentation will begin with a speech from the Finance Minister scheduled to take place at around 11 am.
